name: The Ninja Path
description:
"Ninja Path" is the perfect game if you want to spend an entertaining time in a relaxed tone.

In this game you handle a ninja who walks on the roofs of a city full of skyscrapers. Above these buildings you will find 2 possible characters, or you find hostages, being always a woman in pink, or thieves, who are your enemies. The hostages must jump, if you crash with them you will lose the current game, the thieves will have to attack them, if you try to jump without knocking them you will also lose.
The goal is to reach the maximum possible distance, the maximum score will be stored in the game, so you always consult it and try to improve it whenever you want

What to expect:

-Good sound and music in gameplay.

-Easy to understand game, making it perfect for all ages and tastes.

-Randomly generated gameplay scenario.

-Best score will be stored on game


How to play:

-You just need a mouse to play, left click above the ninja to jump, click again to double jump. Left click on the right side of the ninja to attack.
